bahuthara denekuta me pilibanda pahadili aakalpayak nathi bawa penen nisa tikak pahadili karannam.halal lakuna yam kisi samagamakata ho aayathanayakata nomile labena deyak newe.ee sandaha "ulama" nam muslim aagamika sanwidhanayata warshika gasthu gewimak karanna one.halal lakuna sandaha ayadumpathata pamanaka rupiyal 4000k gewiya yuthuyi.emenma samagame dharithawaye hatiyata ru. 175000.00- 1 500 000.00 athara pramanaye mudalak "ulama" sanwidhanayata gewiya yuthuyi.emenma ee sandaha parikshawata musalmanu sewakayanda path karanu labanawa.ee ayage watupada samagama wisinma dariya yuthu wenawa.
